messages.content:
Last June, we took part in a referendum on our membership of the European Union. As a passionate pro-European, I fought hard to remain.

Since then, the Tory government has exploited the result to tighten its grip over our country. The Prime Minister ignored those who voted to remain and is recklessly driving our nation towards a disastrous hard Brexit.

And Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party are helping the Tories do it.

The Liberal Democrats are the real opposition to Theresa May's hard Brexit. We are fighting to give YOU a say on the final deal, for the rights of EU citizens and to stay in the single market.

Theresa May is determined to sever our relationship with the EU in the most destructive way possible - regardless of the consequences to our economy, our jobs, our NHS, you and future generations. But it doesn't have to be that way.

Everyone agrees that the Tories will win this UK general election. Labour have no hope. This election is our chance to send a message. A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote against hard Brexit.

This constituency is my home. I want to give back to our communities the voice we have been denied for too long. If I earn your vote and return as your MP – a job I loved and cherished for 32 years – I promise you will not feel ignored.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone agrees that the Tories will win this UK general election. Labour have no hope. This election is our chance to send a message. A vote for the Liberal Democrats is a vote against hard Brexit.

leaflet.personalStatement: This constituency is my home. I want to give back to our communities the voice we have been denied for too long. If I earn your vote and return as your MP – a job I loved and cherished for 32 years – I promise you will not feel ignored.
leaflet.additionalNotes: PS: Remember, a vote for me and the Liberal Democrats on June 8th is a vote against Theresa May's hard Brexit which Labour have helped her to pursue. I hope I can count on your support.
